content: get that beautiful & classic cable-knit look but with your crochet hook this cozy crochet cable hat is thick and stylish the pattern makes newborn baby toddler childrens and adult sizes detailed pictures an hd video tutorial graph/chart and of course written instructions all make this pattern easy to follow for any intermediate crocheter **special package discounts when buying multiple patterns ** spend $10 and get 10% off with code lake10 spend $20 and get 20% off with code lake20 spend $30 and get 30% off with code lake30 spend $40 and get 40% off with code lake40 please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free on www lakesideloops com in the future **sizes ** newborn - 14 circumference 5 5 height baby - 16 circumference 6 height toddler - 18 circumference 7 height child - 20 circumference 7 height womens - 22 circumference 8 height mens - 24 circumference 8 height in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes **written pattern** in english us terms **pictures** **chart** **video tutorial** **left hand pattern** available upon request *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* all **finished products** from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online thank you for looking kind wishes kimberley lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
